product_name: Kate SomervilleMini EradiKate 3% Sulfur Daily Foaming Cleanser + Acne Treatment
summary: SummaryKate Somerville's TikTok breakout Star now in travel-size! EradiKate 3% Sulfur Daily Foaming Cleanser is a clinical-strength acne cleanser developed for acne-prone skin, formulated to help combat blackheads, sebaceous filaments, and acne while preventing new breakouts.
details: DetailsBenefitsTarget blackheads + pimplesManage oil + prevent new breakoutsKey Ingredients3% Sulfur: This anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory acne-fighter helps eliminate excess oil, blemishes, and sebaceous filaments while calming skin.Natural Oat Extract: Helps to reduce, absorb and balance sebum.Botanical Complex with Honey + Rice Bran Extracts : Helps calm and soothe skin.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesItem 2638946How To UseUse daily at Morning + Evening. Apply a small amount to wet face and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse with cool water, pat dry and continue with your normal skincare routine.PRO TIP: Kate Somerville's classic sulfur treatment cleanser doubles as a mask for targeting sebaceous filaments. Apply to skin and let it sit for 2-3 minutes before rinsing with cool water. Focus on the t-zone!IngredientsActive: Sulfur 3.0%.Inactive: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Coco-Glucoside, Acrylates Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycereth-18 Ethylhexanoate, Glycereth-18, Stearyl Alcohol, Honey Extract/Mel/Extrait de Miel, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Oligopeptide-10, Boswellia Serrata Extract, Behenyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Disodium Carboxyethyl Siliconate, Linalool, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use daily at Morning + Evening. Apply a small amount to wet face and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse with cool water, pat dry and continue with your normal skincare routine.PRO TIP: Kate Somerville's classic sulfur treatment cleanser doubles as a mask for targeting sebaceous filaments. Apply to skin and let it sit for 2-3 minutes before rinsing with cool water. Focus on the t-zone!

reviews.headline: Wedding Skin Prep
reviews.comments:
Hopping on her becasue I see this hasn't been reveiwed by anyone yet, which shocks me. 
This is a thick and foamy facewash that actually feels like it absorbs into your skin and treats it. After rinsing it off, my skin is super soft and supple feeling and I notice my redness is noticiably reduced after my face calms down from the wash. I used this to get my face ready for my wedding, followed by Kate Sommerville's ExfoliKate Glow Moisturizer and it seemed to be the dynamic duo that I was looking for. I have red, acne prone / roscea skin and this seriously helped keep everytnig calm. 

Side note: my bridesmaid borrowed this and the ExfoliKate Moisturizer for 2 nights, and she doesn't have acne prone or red skin, but she also LOVED how it felt.

rollup.name: Mini EradiKate 3% Sulfur Daily Foaming Cleanser + Acne Treatment
